name: Unlight (FireZage)
description:
A first-person horror game made as a part of the Theory and Practice of Game Design and Development 2022 course at Aalborg University Copenhagen. 

You are trapped inside a laboratory in lockdown and must disable the power in the building to escape. Use your special UV light to stun enemies and survive. 

Controls
  • WASD - Movement 
  • F - Toggle Current Light
  • 1 - Set Current Light to Regular Flashlight 
  • 2 - Set Current Light to UV Flashlight (Stuns Enemies)
